# The Mesh interface

```{julia}
#| echo: false
include("setup.jl")
```

Create mesh

```{julia}
#| echo: false
a = 2
m = makemeshonrectangle(4, 2, 2a, a)
ps = PlotStyle()
ps.edges.outlineonly = false
plot(m, ps)
```

Coordinates of a node

```{julia}
using MMJMesh.Meshes

coordinates(node(m, 2))
```

Coordinates of a face

```{julia}  
coordinates(face(m, 3))
```

Process faces and print node indexes

```{julia}
for f âˆˆ faces(m)
    println(f)
    println("- ", nodeIdxs(f))
end
```
